text: Seyyed Hadi Khosroshahi (; 1939 â€“ 27 February 2020) was an Iranian cleric and politician. He was the first Iranian Ambassador to the Vatican. He was suspected by Western intelligence circles of creating European network of Muslim extremists based in Rome. He was born in Tabriz, Iran. Khosroshahi died of the novel coronavirus on 27 February 2020 in Tehran. ==References== Category:1939 births Category:2020 deaths Category:Deaths from the COVID-19 pandemic in Tehran Category:Asian diplomats Category:Iranian politicians
title: Hadi Khosroshahi
